Arg.V:
#!/bin/bash
function updatepk() { if [ ! -z $1 ]; then if [ -e /var/run/yum.pid ];then exit 10 fi result=`yum -y update $1 2>&1` status=$? commandexist=`echo $result | grep -E "yum: command not found"` if [ "$commandexist" != "" ]; then exit 8 fi
commandexist=`echo $result | grep -E "yum: No such file or directory"` if [ "$commandexist" != "" ]; then exit 8 fi
islock=`echo $result | grep -E "lock /var/run/yum.pid"`
if [ "$islock" != "" ]; then exit 10 fi
islock=`echo $result | grep -E "/var/run/yum.pid: another copy is running"`
if [ "$islock" != "" ]; then exit 10 fi
isnotconnected=`echo $result | grep -E "There was an error communicating with RHN"` if [ "$isnotconnected" != "" ]; then exit 9 fi
isnotconnected=`echo $result | grep -E "This system is not registered with RHN"` if [ "$isnotconnected" != "" ]; then exit 9 fi
isnotconnected=`echo $result | grep -E "No Repositories Available to Set Up"` if [ "$isnotconnected" != "" ]; then exit 9 fi isnotconnected=`echo $result | grep -E "Error Class Code: 9 Error Class Info: Invalid System Credentials"` if [ "$isnotconnected" != "" ]; then exit 9 fi isscriptletfailed=`echo $result | grep -E "error:" | grep -E "scriptlet failed, exit status 255"` if [ "$isscriptletfailed" != "" ]; then exit 6 fi if [ $status -ne 0 ];then exit 7 fi fi } updatepk Red_Hat_Enterprise_Linux-Release_Notes-7-as-IN
exit 0

Vulnerability.Title: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7.3 Release Notes
Vulnerability.Description:
Updated Release Notes packages that add two enhancements are now available for Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7. Red Hat Enterprise Linux minor releases are an aggregation of individual enhancement, security, and bug fix errata. The Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7.3 Release Notes document describes the major changes made to the Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7 operating system and its accompanying applications for this minor release.
For the most up-to-date version of the Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7.3 Release Notes, see the book online:
https://access.redhat.com/documentation/en-US/Red_Hat_Enterprise_Linux/7/html/7.3_Release_Notes/index.html
This update adds the following enhancements:
* In Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7.2, selected Release Notes packages were modified to contain a hyperlink to the online book in the given language, as opposed to its potentially outdated copy. With this update, the remaining packages have been modified this way, too. However, note that Release Notes are no longer translated into all language variants. A hyperlink to the English version is therefore used where a translation is not provided.
* Packages for all language variants except for bn_IN, en_US, pt_BR, zh_CN, and zh_TW have been rebuilt with an additional "Provides:" RPM tag that specifies the corresponding short locale code, for example "Red_Hat_Enterprise_Linux-Release_Notes-7-ja". This metadata can then be used by the langpacks Yum plug-in to install the Release Notes package relevant your native language configured as the default locale in your installation of Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7. (BZ#1332966)
All users are advised to upgrade to these updated packages, which add these enhancements.
Note for remediation: Please disable the SELinux for RHEL 4/5 when repairing, or some rpm packages will fail to install.
